attributes.action: We want the police to chase all suspects on Motorcycles who discard their helmet
attributes.background: With the rise in national crime involving motorcycles/scooters we believe it's in the public interest to chase, apprehend and prosecute all suspected criminals on Motorcycles & scooters.

rejection.details:
This is an operational decision for individual police forces.

You could contact your police and crime commissioner (PCC) to make a suggestion or a complaint about how your local area is policed:

https://www.gov.uk/police-and-crime-commissioners
